description: This file contains utility functions for sorting and checking the order of source map segments, including functions for sorting segments and determining if segments are sorted. It is part of a source map processing module.

methods.name: export default function maybeSort( maybeSort
methods.description: Sorts the source map segments if they are not already sorted, optionally mutating the input array if owned is true.

methods.name: function nextUnsortedSegmentLine(mappings: SourceMapSegment[][], start: number): number { nextUnsortedSegmentLine
methods.description: Finds the index of the first unsorted segment line starting from a given index.

methods.name: function isSorted(line: SourceMapSegment[]): boolean { isSorted
methods.description: Checks whether a line of source map segments is sorted by COLUMN.

methods.name: function sortSegments(line: SourceMapSegment[], owned: boolean): SourceMapSegment[] { sortSegments
methods.description: Sorts a line of source map segments based on the COLUMN value, optionally mutating the input if owned is false.

methods.name: export function sortComparator<T extends SourceMapSegment | ReverseSegment>(a: T, b: T): number / sortComparator

ctags.name: sortComparator
ctags.pattern: /^export function sortComparator<T extends SourceMapSegment | ReverseSegment>(a: T, b: T): number /
